content:
From: Jasmin Blanchette <jasmin.blanchette@inria.fr>
It is a long-standing custom of ITP (and TPHOLs) to vote on where the next installment of the conference should take place. Anyone who is seriously considering attending ITP 2017 is entitled to vote. We received two bids, which can be viewed at

https://itp2016.inria.fr/bids-to-host-itp-2017/

You should send your vote by email to

itp2016@inria.fr

Include your name and affiliation for the sole purpose of preventing ballot stuffing. All votes will remain secret. The deadline for voting is

Friday 3 June 2016

Regards,

Jasmin Blanchette and Stephan Merz
ITP 2016 organizers
